CalculatePaymentTermsRequest.description: Required fields for products=[CONSUMER_LOAN] calculationTypes=[PAYMENT_TERMS] are=[loanParts]. Required fields for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN] calculationTypes=[PAYMENT_TERMS] are=[loanParts].

amountGross.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN, CONSUMER_LOAN].CalculationTypes=[MAX_LOAN, LTI]. Is formatted as currency.

PartyFinancialAmount.description: Required fields for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN] calculationTypes=[LTI] are=[amountGross].

yield.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN].CalculationTypes=[LTV]. Is formatted as currency.

percentage.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN]. Is formatted as percentage.

serviceCosts.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN]. Is formatted as currency.

salesTax.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN]. Is formatted as currency.

ExpenseAmount.description: Required fields for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN] calculationTypes=[LTI] are=[amountGross]. When field=[expenseAmountType] has value/s=[REVOLVING_CREDIT] then field/s=[creditLimit] is/are required

LabelledCalculationBase.description: Required fields for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN] calculationTypes=[PAYMENT_TERMS, LOAN_DURATION] are=[date].

Assessment.description: Required fields for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN] are=[documentRef, assessmentType, date, name, dossierPhase, validationDate, result, rules]. Required fields for products=[CONSUMER_LOAN] are=[date, assessmentType, dossierPhase, validationDate, result, rules].

amount.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN]. Is formatted as currency.

pensionAmount.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN, CONSUMER_LOAN].CalculationTypes=[MAX_LOAN, LTI, ADDITIONAL_LOAN, ADDITIONAL_LOAN_PAYMENT_CAPACITY].

CalculatePaymentTermsResponse.description: Required fields for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN] calculationTypes=[PAYMENT_TERMS, LOAN_DURATION] are=[date].

RentalIncome.description: Required fields for products=[CONSUMER_LOAN] are=[providerRef]. Required fields for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN] are=[providerRef].

assetRef.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN].CalculationTypes=[LTI, ADDITIONAL_LOAN, ADDITIONAL_LOAN_PAYMENT_CAPACITY]. ElementRef for field [asset].

rentalContractRef.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN].CalculationTypes=[LTI, ADDITIONAL_LOAN, ADDITIONAL_LOAN_PAYMENT_CAPACITY]. ElementRef for field [rentalContract].

grossYearIncome.description: Relevant for products=[MORTGAGE_LOAN].CalculationTypes=[LTI, ADDITIONAL_LOAN, ADDITIONAL_LOAN_PAYMENT_CAPACITY]. Is formatted as currency.
